about_the_game:
Explore more stories from the Victorian-inspired world of Rainybrook in our 30 page color comic, featuring all-new art by award-winning comic artists.


Explore the back story to the Villagers in Venture to the Vile!

We have teamed up with Lethal Comics on this 30-page comic featuring all-new art by award-winning comic veterans, whose work includes such projects as Batman, Wonder Woman, Over the Garden Wall, Harley Quinn, and more!


Come and see what happens when the dark and beautiful world of Venture to the Vile collides with some of the best comic artists working in the industry.


Including art from Karl Kershl, Andy Belanger, Rozenn Grosjean, and Cara McGee on interiors, and Sweeney Boo, Marguerite Sauvage, Rebeca Puebla (subersivegirl) on covers,
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/ComicBookディスクリプション用.png
Dive back into the story and discover more about your favorite characters, the lore of Rainybrook, and more. What untold mysteries will you uncover in these epic stories of the Vile?

Wishlist button for comic book [insert steam link and Steam will convert it to a button]

About the game
Venture to the Vile is a spooky 2.5D Metroidvania set in the strange town of Rainybrook, which has been overrun by a mysterious entity known as the Vile.

Absorb the Vile’s powers, fight through treacherous grounds that were once your home, and find your lost friend Ella before it’s too late!



Follow us on other platforms below!
Twitter, IG, Discord, TikTok
